charges.charge_description: 18:13-7220.P TRAFFIC OFFENSES: Ct 1 (47 OS 6-308(b)) OPERATING MV W/O DL IN IMMEDIATE POSSESSION, Ct 2 (47 OS 1151) OPERATING MV W/O PROPER LICENSE PLATE DECAL, Ct 3 (47 OS 860) DISPLAY CERT OF INSPECTION &; APPROVAL ON MV KNOWING SAME TO BE FICTITIOUS, Ct 4 (47 OS 7-606(A)) FAILURE TO PRODUCE PROOF OF COMPULSORY INS, Ct 5 (38 CFR 1.218(b)(25)) UNAUTHORIZED PARKING IN RESERVED SPACE (1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant's punishment is fixed at a fine of $50.00 on each count ($200.00 total) and S/A of $10.00 on ct I and $5.00 S/A on cts 2,3 and 4. (1-4)
